member.name: P:GriTon.XML2Word.XML2WORD.XMLFile
member.summary: Filename of the XML contianing information to be merged.

member.name: P:GriTon.XML2Word.XML2WORD.XMLString
member.summary: Alternative to XMLFile, provide the XML as string.

member.name: P:GriTon.XML2Word.XML2WORD.WordTemplate
member.summary: Filename of the word DOT (document template)

member.name: P:GriTon.XML2Word.XML2WORD.Path
member.summary: Path the documents to be generated into.

member.name: P:GriTon.XML2Word.XML2WORD.DocumentPrefix
member.summary: Prefix of the generated word documents.

member.name: M:GriTon.XML2Word.XML2WORD.Execute(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starts MS Word and merges a XML with the word template file.
member.param: if true the Word instance will be disposed, if false the Word instance will be visible at end of generation.
